00043         @Override
00044         public ResultSet execute(String request, OrmActions action)
00045 
00046         {
00047                 try
00048                 {
00049                         Statement stat = connexion.createStatement();
00050 
00051                         if (action.equals(OrmActions.SEARCH))
00052                         {
00053                                 ResultSet rs = stat.executeQuery(request);
00054                                 return rs;
00055                         }
00056 
00057                         stat.execute(request);
00058                         return stat.getGeneratedKeys();
00059 
00060                 } catch (SQLException e)
00061                 {
00062                         throw new OrmSqlException(
00063                                         "SqlException when executing the request. Check for entity names matching SqLite keyword could be done : "
00064                                                         + e.getMessage());
00065                 }
00066         }
00067 
00068         @Override
00069         public void disconnect()
00070         {
00071                 try
00072                 {
00073                         connexion.close();
00074                 } catch (SQLException e)
00075                 {
00076                         throw new OrmSqlException(
00077                                         "Error whe disconnecting from the database : "
00078                                                         + e.getMessage());
00079                 }
00080         }

00082         @Override
00083         public void connect()
00084         {
00085                 try
00086                 {
00087                         Class.forName("org.sqlite.JDBC");
00088                         connexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:sqlite:"
00089                                         + dataBaseFileName);
00090                 } catch (Exception e)
00091                 {
00092                         throw new OrmSqlException("Error connecting to the database : "
00093                                         + e.getMessage());
00094                 }
00095         }

00097         @Override
00098         public ResultSet addColumnToTable(AbstractOrmEntity entity, Field<?> field)
00099 
00100         {
00101                 String sqlQuery = "ALTER TABLE " + prefix + entity.getSystemName()
00102                                 + " ADD COLUMN ";
00103 
00104                 if (field instanceof FieldDouble)
00105                 {
00106                         sqlQuery += " " + field.getShortName() + " DOUBLE PRECISION;";
00107                 }
00108                 else if (field instanceof FieldString || field instanceof FieldDateTime)
00109                 {
00110                         sqlQuery += " " + field.getShortName() + " STRING;";
00111                 }
00112                 else if (field instanceof FieldBool || field instanceof FieldInt)
00113                 {
00114                         sqlQuery += " " + field.getShortName() + " INTEGER;";
00115                 }
00116 
00117                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00118 
00119                 return execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.OTHER);
00120 
00121                 // todo: mettre une valeur par defaut dans la colone ajoute
00122         }

00125         @Deprecated
00126         public ResultSet select(AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity,
00127                         Vector<String> searchCriteriasParam)
00128         {
00129                 String sqlQuery = "SELECT * FROM " + prefix
00130                                 + searchEntity.getSystemName();
00131 
00132                 if (searchCriteriasParam != null)
00133                         sqlQuery = buildWhereClauseForQuery(sqlQuery, searchCriteriasParam);
00134 
00135                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00136 
00137                 ResultSet rs = execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.SEARCH);
00138 
00139                 return rs;
00140         }

00151         private static String buildWhereClauseForQuery(
00152                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> searchEntities)
00153         {
00154                 String whereClause = "";
00155                 int entityPosition = 0;
00156                 boolean addedCriteriaToWhereCondition = false;
00157                 whereClause += " WHERE ";
00158 
00159                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : searchEntities)
00160                 {
00161                         // Si les fields de
00162                         // cette entité
00163                         // ne contiennent que des null
00164                         if (!entity.getFields().containsValues())
00165                                 continue;
00166 
00167                         entityPosition += 1;
00168                         whereClause += "( ";
00169 
00170                         for (Field<?> field : entity.getFields().getFields())
00171                         {
00172                                 if (field.getCalcul() == null && field.getData() != null)
00173                                 {
00174                                         whereClause += field.getShortName() + " "
00175                                                         + field.getOperator() + " '"
00176                                                         + field.getDataString(true) + "'";
00177 
00178                                         whereClause += " AND ";
00179                                 }
00180                         }
00181 
00182                         whereClause = whereClause.substring(0, whereClause.length() - 4);
00183 
00184                         if (entity.getFields().getFields().size() < entityPosition)
00185                                 whereClause += " OR ";
00186 
00187                         whereClause += ")";
00188                         // au moins un field était
00189                         // utilisable donc on cré
00190                         // un where
00191                         addedCriteriaToWhereCondition = true;
00192                 }
00193 
00194                 if (addedCriteriaToWhereCondition)
00195                         return whereClause; // On retourne la clause du where car elle n'est
00196                 // pas vide
00197                 return "";// Sinon, aucune clause where ne doit être ajoutée
00198         }
00199 
00209         private static String buildWhereClauseForQuery(
00210                         AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity, String sqlQuery)
00211         {
00212                 sqlQuery += " WHERE ( ";
00213 
00214                 for (Field<?> field : searchEntity.getFields().getFields())
00215                 {
00216                         if (field.getCalcul() == null && field.getData() != null)
00217                         {
00218                                 sqlQuery += field.getShortName() + " " + field.getOperator()
00219                                                 + " '" + field.getDataString(true) + "'";
00220 
00221                                 sqlQuery += " AND ";
00222                         }
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 sqlQuery = sqlQuery.substring(0, sqlQuery.length() - 4);
00226 
00227                 return sqlQuery += ");";
00228         }
00229 
00237         private static String buildSetClauseForQuery(Fields fields, String sqlQuery)
00238         {
00239                 Iterator<Field<?>> dataIterator = fields.iterator();
00240 
00241                 while (dataIterator.hasNext())
00242                 {
00243                         // Retrieve key
00244                         Field<?> data = dataIterator.next();
00245                         if (!data.getShortName().matches("PK.*")
00246                                         && data.getCalcul() == null && data.getData() != null)
00247                         {
00248                                 sqlQuery += data.getShortName() + "='"
00249                                                 + data.getDataString(true) + "', ";
00250                         }
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 return sqlQuery.substring(0, sqlQuery.length() - 2);
00254         }
00255 
00267         private static String buildWhereClauseForQuery(String sqlQuery,
00268                         Vector<String> searchCriterias)
00269         {
00270                 return sqlQuery + buildWhereClause(searchCriterias) + ";";
00271         }

00273         @Override
00274         public ResultSet select(Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> searchEntities)
00275 
00276         {
00277                 String sqlQuery = "SELECT * FROM " + prefix
00278                                 + searchEntities.get(0).getSystemName();
00279 
00280                 if (!searchEntities.isEmpty())
00281                         sqlQuery += buildWhereClauseForQuery(searchEntities) + ";";
00282 
00283                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00284 
00285                 ResultSet rs = execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.SEARCH);
00286 
00287                 return rs;
00288         }

00290         @Override
00291         public int insert(AbstractOrmEntity newEntity)
00292         {
00293                 String sqlQuery = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + newEntity.getSystemName()
00294                                 + "( ";
00295 
00296                 Iterator<?> keyIterator = newEntity.getFields().iterator();
00297 
00298                 while (keyIterator.hasNext())
00299                 {
00300                         Field<?> field = (Field<?>) keyIterator.next();
00301 
00302                         if (!field.getShortName().matches("PK.*"))
00303                         {
00304                                 if (field.getCalcul() == null && field.getData() != null)
00305                                 {
00306                                         sqlQuery += "'" + field.getShortName() + "', ";
00307                                 }
00308                         }
00309 
00310                 }
00311 
00312                 sqlQuery = sqlQuery.substring(0, sqlQuery.length() - 2);
00313                 sqlQuery += ") VALUES (";
00314 
00315                 Iterator<?> dataIterator = newEntity.getFields().iterator();
00316 
00317                 while (dataIterator.hasNext())
00318                 {
00319                         Field<?> field = (Field<?>) dataIterator.next();
00320 
00321                         if (!field.getShortName().matches("PK.*"))
00322                         {
00323                                 if (field.getCalcul() == null && field.getData() != null)
00324                                 {
00325                                         sqlQuery += "'" + field.getDataString(true) + "', ";
00326                                 }
00327                         }
00328                 }
00329 
00330                 sqlQuery = sqlQuery.substring(0, sqlQuery.length() - 2);
00331                 sqlQuery += ");";
00332 
00333                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00334 
00335                 ResultSet rs = execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.INSERT);
00336 
00337                 int primaryKeyValue;
00338                 try
00339                 {
00340                         primaryKeyValue = rs.getInt(1);
00341 
00342                 } catch (SQLException e)
00343                 {
00344                         // s'il n'y a pas de cle primaire dans cette table, on ne throw donc
00345                         // pas cette exception
00346                         primaryKeyValue = 0;
00347                 }
00348 
00349                 return primaryKeyValue;
00350         }

00415         public boolean isEntityExists(String entitySystemName)
00416         {
00417                 String sqlQuery = "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master where name='"
00418                                 + prefix + entitySystemName + "';";
00419 
00420                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00421 
00422                 ResultSet rs = execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.SEARCH);
00423 
00424                 try
00425                 {
00426                         return rs.next();
00427                 } catch (SQLException e)
00428                 {
00429                         throw new OrmSqlException("probleme ici");
00430                 }
00431         }

00433         @Override
00434         public void createIndex(String entityName, String fieldName)
00435 
00436         {
00437                 String indexName = fieldName + "_index";
00438                 String tableName = prefix + entityName;
00439 
00440                 String sqlQuery = "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS " + indexName + " ON "
00441                                 + tableName + " (" + fieldName + ");";
00442 
00443                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00444                 execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.OTHER);
00445         }

00447         @Override
00448         public void createTableForEntity(AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00449 
00450         {
00451                 // Be sure to create the table only if it doesn't already
00452                 // exists
00453                 String sqlQuery = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ";
00454                 Collection<Field<?>> fields = ((AbstractEntity) entity).getFields()
00455                                 .getFields();
00456 
00457                 sqlQuery += prefix + entity.getSystemName() + " ( ";
00458 
00459                 // For each field into my entity
00460                 for (Field<?> field : fields)
00461                 {
00462                         // If it is a primary because it matches PK, else we
00463                         // check the datatypes and match them with a datatype
00464                         // good for the database
00465                         // TODO : Jo je ne comprend pas pourquoi tu fesait ca,
00466                         // bref ca buggait car il arrivait sur le if, ce n'était
00467                         // pas vrai alors il n'insérait aucun champs. Svp dire
00468                         // c'est quoi tu veut faire. La je l'ai enlevé, anyway
00469                         // ca sert a rien de faire un if avec aucun traitement
00470                         // non?
00471                         if (field.getCalcul() != null)
00472                         {
00473                                 // do not do anything
00474                         }
00475                         else if (field.getShortName().matches("PK.*"))
00476                         {
00477                                 sqlQuery += field.getShortName()
00478                                                 + " INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ";
00479                         }
00480                         else if (field instanceof FieldDouble)
00481                         {
00482                                 sqlQuery += field.getShortName() + " DOUBLE PRECISION, ";
00483                         }
00484                         else if (field instanceof FieldString
00485                                         || field instanceof FieldDateTime)
00486                         {
00487                                 sqlQuery += field.getShortName() + " STRING, ";
00488                         }
00489                         else if (field instanceof FieldBool || field instanceof FieldInt)
00490                         {
00491                                 sqlQuery += field.getShortName() + " INTEGER, ";
00492                         }
00493                 }
00494                 sqlQuery = sqlQuery.substring(0, sqlQuery.length() - 2) + " );";
00495 
00496                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00497 
00498                 execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.CREATE);
00499         }

00501         @Override
00502         public void updateUnique(AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity,
00503                         AbstractOrmEntity entityContainingChanges)
00504         {
00505                 String sqlQuery = "UPDATE " + prefix
00506                                 + entityContainingChanges.getSystemName() + " SET ";
00507 
00508                 sqlQuery = buildSetClauseForQuery(entityContainingChanges.getFields(),
00509                                 sqlQuery);
00510                 sqlQuery = buildWhereClauseForQuery(searchEntity, sqlQuery);
00511 
00512                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00513 
00514                 execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.UPDATE);
00515         }

00517         @Override
00518         @Deprecated
00519         public ResultSet select(AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity,
00520                         Vector<String> searchCriteriasParam, int limit, int offset,
00521                         String orderBy)
00522         {
00523                 String sqlQuery = "SELECT * FROM " + prefix
00524                                 + searchEntity.getSystemName();
00525 
00526                 if (searchCriteriasParam != null)
00527                         sqlQuery += buildWhereClause(searchCriteriasParam);
00528 
00529                 if (orderBy != null && orderBy.length() > 0)
00530                         sqlQuery += " ORDER BY " + orderBy;
00531 
00532                 sqlQuery = sqlQuery + " LIMIT " + offset + ", " + limit + ";";
00533 
00534                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00535 
00536                 ResultSet rs = execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.SEARCH);
00537 
00538                 return rs;
00539         }

00541         private static String buildWhereClause(Vector<String> searchCriteriasParam)
00542         {
00543                 String whereClause = " WHERE ( ";
00544 
00545                 // We add each string to the sqlQuery
00546                 for (String parameter : searchCriteriasParam)
00547                         whereClause += parameter + " ";
00548 
00549                 return whereClause + " )";
00550         }

00552         @Override
00553         @Deprecated
00554         public int count(AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity,
00555                         Vector<String> searchParameterList)
00556         {
00557                 // Pour une raison quelconque, la fonction COUNT de SQLite empêche la
00558                 // transaction de se terminer
00559                 // Alors on utilise un count fait à bras
00560 
00561                 String sqlQuery = "SELECT " + searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName()
00562                                 + " FROM " + prefix + searchEntity.getSystemName();
00563 
00564                 if (searchParameterList != null)
00565                         sqlQuery += buildWhereClause(searchParameterList);
00566 
00567                 sqlQuery += ";";
00568 
00569                 Logger.debug("[SGDB_SQLITE] SQL query produced : " + sqlQuery);
00570 
00571                 ResultSet rs = execute(sqlQuery, OrmActions.SEARCH);
00572 
00573                 int count = 0;
00574                 try
00575                 {
00576                         while (rs.next())
00577                                 count++;
00578 
00579                 } catch (SQLException e)
00580                 {
00581                         throw new OrmSqlException("probleme ici");
00582                 }
00583                 return count;
00584         }

00586         @Override
00587         public void doBackup()
00588         {
00589                 Logger.info("Backup de la DB");
00590                 sgbdSqliteBackupManager.doBackup(dataBaseFileName,
00591                                 BackupManager.getMaximumBackupInstanceCount());
00592         }

00595         public long getLatestBackupTime()
